eu_initiatives: food fraud and all other topics related to this subject. From transportation, production to distribution etcetera
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
http://www.oliveoil.org/en/onaoo/mission-filosofia.aspx 
 
 
PHILOSOPHY. 
The National Organization for Olive Oil Tasters, part offshoot of the Italian Union of Chambers of Commerce, came into being in 1983 Imperia due to the initiative of the local Chamber of Commerce and a group of very experienced tasters. They wished to defend, protect and enhance the value of that important technical and cultural patrimony which is the art of olive oil tasting. 
The Organization pays close attention to issues such as product quality, correct storage and use and consumer education. ONAOO strives to maintain a totally open outlook on all areas of production worldwide, both around and beyond the Mediterranean, and to appreciate the organoleptic characteristics of great oils worldwide. We firmly believe that quality, like culture, has no borders.
goals__remit: to make consumers aware of possible food fraud with olive oil and other products due to bad production, legislation, distribution etcetera
relevant_communication: lectures on food fraud and other topics regarding olive oil and other foods.
